data.title: Dorothy Elizabeth Kagan (1912-1995)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Dorothy Kagan born 1912 Whitehouse, New Jersey died 1995 Perth Amboy, New Jersey, USA including ancestors + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors

[spouse(s) unknown]

[children unknown]

Profile last modified 25 Apr 2022 | Created 24 Apr 2022

This page has been accessed 41 times.

Biography

When Dorothy E. Kagan was born on May 21, 1912, in Whitehouse, New Jersey, her father, Fredrick, was 20, and her mother, Iva, was 18. [1]

She married John Salvatore Oliver in 1936, when he was 39 and she was 23. [2] Sixteen years her senior, Salvatore was listed as a boarder at her family's home in the 1930 census, when he was 33 and she was 17. Dorothy's parents named a son born in 1923 Salvatore. As this is not a family name on either side, it appears likely he was named after John Salvatore Oliver. [3]

John Salvatore and Dorothy made their home in Middlesex County, New jersey and had at least four sons and one daughter. [4]

Dorothy died on November 15, 1995, in Perth Amboy, New Jersey, at the age of 83.[5]

Research Notes

Therre is no FindAGrave Memorial for her and I have not located an online obituary.
